title: vandanai aruL tha
sahitya:
Vandannai arul tha vaarana mukhane    

        Undan mmedu nambina adimai naan 



anupallavi



 Chandra sekaran umai eenra mainda 

Chandanam sindhuram aninda deva 



caraNam



Nonda manam aara bandha vanai gal teera 

        Sondam nee taan enru enni 

        Undan taalinai abhayam enru 

        Vanangi vandidum bharanin bhaktan
